# Blinking (Ring)
## Overview
**Aura** moderate transmutation; **CL** 7th

**Slot** ring

**Price** 27,000 gp

**Weight** â€”

On command, this ring makes the wearer blink, as the *[[Blink (Spell)|blink]]* spell.

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], *[[Blink (Spell)|blink]]*

**Cost** 13,500 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 478
